title: A Surge of Overseas Abortion Pills Blunted the Effects of State Abortion Bans
description: New data suggests that abortion has declined about 2 percent in the U.S. since the end of Roe, accounting for people who traveled across state lines or ordered pills online.
dc:creator: Aatish Bhatia, Claire Cain Miller and Margot Sanger-Katz
media:description: Abortion rights supporters set up an abortion pills educational booth as they protested outside the Supreme Court in July.
